label: UsageCondition
comment: The particular state of something, affected by use, that should be respected.

datatypeProperties.comment: An age limitation, expressed as text, for this specified usage condition.
Appropriate clothing, expressed as text, for this specified usage condition.
A duration, expressed as text, for this specified period.
A gender limitation, expressed as text, for this specified usage condition.
Occupancy, expressed as text, for this specified usage condition.
A party requiring this specified usage condition.

referencedBy.comment: The particular state of something, affected by use, that should be respected.
